attributes.action: investigate aircraft chemical spraying over the uk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Order an independant investigation into the chemtrail/chemical spraying of the atmosphere over the uk, two of the elements being sprayed are "BARIUM & ALLUMINIUM POWDER". A jet aircraft will leave vapour trails at an altitude of 32 thousand feet or over which dissipate between 2 to 10 minutes later,the chemtrails however linger for hours and spread out to cover the sky leaving it a milky white colour, what are the possible implications to the health of the people of the uk?.
